Description:
Detects execution from an Alternate Data Stream (ADS). Adversaries may use NTFS file attributes to hide their malicious data in order to evade detection

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Execute From Alternate Data Streams
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%txt:%' and ((command like '%makecab %' and command like '%.cab%') or (command like '%reg %' and command like '% export %') or (command like '%regedit %' and command like '% /e %') or (command like '%esentutl %' and command like '% /y %' and command like '% /d %' and command like '% /o %') or (command like '%type %' and command like '% > %')))
